RR4b9-Ss1sc7J5fQouqduA.text: This restaurant gets one star for seating options food is exceptional but every time you go there there's nowhere to sit the owner needs to do something to increase his seating capacity you order your food get your food and there will be no where to sit and you have no option other than take it to go home and then it's cold

nGaQS4oCu7mqnQ813SPyTA.text: Good place for fast food.  They have a great service, all the Employees were super nice. I ate the chicken skewers with rice and it was delicious! Will absolutely go back for more.  Highly recommended!

m-536B7bq4ch8Xknq8oJWg.text: After watching Guy Fieri munching on some gyro I also had a craving. I remember seeing the Great Greek when I met some friends at the neighboring deli so I drove here. A small dining area inside and a patio outdoors there were plenty of seating option.  -Started out with the Melizanosalata. A roasted eggplant puree with garlic,  olive oil, lemon juice, tomato and onion served with some pita bread. It was delicious!  - next I had a beef lamb gyro. It is loaded up with meat, tzatziki, onion and tomato on a pita. A nice portion had me filled up in no time. I got the combo which came with your choice of soup, salad, fries or feta fries. I had the feta fries and glad I did. These were very good.

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Melizanosalata $3.95

VYv1A5LfYlDiNRqtuzmmFg.text: Lamb, steak and chicken, all a delight! Everyone aims to please.  Yummy and convenient. I'm sure they cater a party for me soon!

G1hd6kwsIPUmoAa-Fgiefg.text: I ordered a side of steak skewer, shrimp skewer and  a side of rice. The skewers came along with the rest of our orders except for rice.  5 minutes later I asked where my rice is coz I have been nibbling on my skewers.  Lady apologized and said it's still being cooked and it should be ready in a few minutes.  I got up and said to the cashier to cancel the rice and to just order me a side of the shrimp skewer since I really liked it and will pay for the difference.  Cashier said to me that since it's their fault, they won't do a refund on rice but instead to just give me the shrimp skewer without charging me the difference.  Because she took ownership of the mistake and a few minutes later, the shrimp came, I WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK TO THIS PLACE.   That cashier has a great attitude.  Thank you!

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Shrimp Skewer

-YEbiu3VRX3luYX7xhia1A.text: This food was fantastic!! Fresh and nothing to pick out. We typically eat all weekend at Whole Foods. We will definitely be stopping here when we come for tournaments.

zkBaFx-Ki_pXYVm6sc7B9g.text: Awesome food!! love the gyros plate!! amazing staff so very nice and helpful!  and nearby my favorite shopping making this the best spot to stop for lunch or dinner!! Gyros plate is delicious the fries are top notch and salad is fresh, and tasty! I love to stop here when we come to Henderson! 0

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States

adpDBij6KufNjyzPpCzoiw.text: Ohhhhh yeah. This is my kinda place!  As an avid lover of greek food, The Great Greek delivers. On this particular day, I was here with a man friend and we were lucky enough to score the last table. I will say, a place that gets this busy needs more seating. That is a good thing for them, but not so good for the poor business guys that walked in and were desperate for a table.  I get it though. The place is yummy!  I had a gyro and their fries covered in feta and my friend had a plate with gyro meat. The is the real deal. Right off the spit. Doesn't get much better.  Service wise, they were very nice. They have a lot of people working back there but they seem to have it down. Prices are reasonable, especially for the quality! I didn't notice the Spanakopita until after I ordered but if they have that next time, MARK ME DOWN!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Super crunchy fries with feta! TO-DIE-FOR

uiy8V1HwsbX1MVerR6Fngw.text: Great Greek food :)   What else do you need to know? We got chicken gyro and steak gyro plate. So delicious and fresh! I couldn't stop eating. The place is small and very busy. But totally worth the wait - great lunch spot!

p29xMG9LitZ8-edM74Zxng.text: This great food is so good! The ingredients are so fresh it makes me wonder if they have their own garden. We come here each time we passed through Las Vegas

3kGU_ozfbNGPv6H1Le2ACA.text: I was not a fan of Greek food, but this place proved me to be very wrong. Everything is amazing, the baklava is the best I've ever had. I find myself craving their avgelmono during all my waking hours. The pitas are awesome, their skewers are perfect. Eat here, it's awesome. And it's pretty cheap, too. Great service, great people. There is absolutely nothing about this spot that I don't love. If you're eating in, the feta fries are delicious. I wouldn't really recommend the fries for delivery, but you can have anything else delivered without a problem. The fries tend to lose their crisp during delivery, but that's just what happens to fries and it's not something the restaurant can do much about. I get my delivery through GrubHub, I don't think the restaurant offers it themselves.

BchIMFuAkVz7_Kp2JAuiOQ.text: We've been eating here about once a week! So good! I usually get the chicken or steak skewer plate, and my boyfriend loves the lamb. All 3 are great and come with rice and salad. Tzatziki is good and so is the hummus! We love the Greek cookies and tried the baklava ice cream, which was yummy as well! So glad we found this place!

XN_feIlgOsHCckbj0rmdEg.text: A friend an I stopped by here during a long lunch break. The interior is small, with limited seating but on a nice day you can always enjoy your meal on their outdoor tables.   The guy who took our order was very friendly and he  immediately made my visit a little bit more enjoyable. Both my friend and I got the great greek gyro which comes with lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, tzaziki sauce and feta cheese. I made it a combo and got the regular fries and a drink. The food came out quickly and just looking at it made my mouth water. The gyro is a good size, the meat was flavorful and the tzaziki sauce and feta added just the perfect amount of a cool, creamy contrast. I was pleasantly surprised that the french fries were hot, crispy and didn't taste like frozen potatoes.   This is a great place to get some Greek food in the Henderson area and I would highly recommend checking this place out.

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Great Greek gyro with fries

wumJYkcVmLZAnvP-DEhmCw.text: Tried for 1st time 10/4/14, everything we had was awesome! Athenian burger, chicken gyro, soup, and feta fries are worth the calories. The service was very friendly and they have outdoor patio seating which we enjoyed. Will be back.

N69FswDEwaSHAubUOSBRRA.text: Omg!!! The most excellent Greek salad I've had. Add the gyro meat, which is superb, and you have a great lunch. The staff was extremely nice, and welcoming. They were very attentive to the customers. There was one guy running the show, and in between taking orders, he was cleaning up the table and even had the sense of making sure those who needed a table, got one inside because it was a very hot day.

-uoCxlEB_vXuw6zk8Cw6zA.text: This place is great, everything on the menu looks amazing but I have only had the gyro. Can't wait to go back. Better than other greek places in the area that I have tried.

Qlyjfg2NcZE9RTf3Pl7dMQ.text: O man, this place is amazingly good. I got the garlic shrimp & we also got the steak souvloki(meat was perfectly cooked) Along with the feta fries! Everything was loaded with feta, cooked & seasoned to perfection. I will definitely hit this place when I'm in Henderson

KTzZQZJGUvNzryDlEkZV4g.text: We've been coming here since we moved to LV almost 2 years ago and we are never let down with the service or quality of food. We always order our usuals - Tzatziki w/ extra pita bread, a Great Greek Gyro combo w/ Feta Fries and a Steak Souvlaki platter. Everything is fresh and we're always more than satisfied!

BZ7pTJJojztclmzHCyRmBQ.text: I absolutely love this place.  It was my first introduction to Greek food, and it has been a fabulous adventure ever since.  The chicken and lemon rice soup in brilliant, as are the beef lamb gyros and falafel.  Reasonable prices and a great clean Greek atmosphere sharpen its appeal.  And best of all, it's a family owned place where you can be greeted by the friendly and knowledgable mother son team daily.

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Beef lamb gyro is where it&#39;s at.

DTN-jXAk18dOyf5B7TIdFQ.text: I should get a frequent customer card for how often I come to this place. That being said, The Great Greek offers a clean, affordable, welcoming and most importantly, DELICIOUS dining experience. Immediately walking into the restaurant, you can sense the meticulous family touch that is all over the place, from the service, to the ambiance.   The food is not a wallet buster, which is an additional plus given the quality of the food. I am a frequent consumer of the chicken rice bowl. Freshly prepared, with fresh ingredients, you really can't go wrong.  I recommend The Great Greek frequently to my peers and friends. They have always treated me well, and I've always left full, and satisfied. Definite must try.

2YopbOonIR3RqFVaVtGNJg.text: Wow!  Excellent! Everything is fresh and delicious. Saw this place on yelp, traveling from out of town and thought we'd try this place. The plates are loaded with food. The employees take real pride in working here. They have a sweet little patio and the whole place is clean and bright. You must try this place.

uNModByEDNIeKC49zarSZA.text: Delicious!!!!! They have the best Falafels in town and the hummus is great too! The services is great despite it being packed all the time. Seating is limited so I would recommend getting your food to go. I think they should expand!!!!!!

D7Q-w9qiA3BwyDOJA1am7A.text: Delicious Greek food close to home. The flavor is wonderful and it tastes so fabulously fresh. A healthy favorite that keeps me coming back for more. Definitely recommend the Mezze Plate if you want to get a taste for the place. Even their dolmades, a food I typically dislike, is really delicious!

Y4ZTlVna0z3BqhGgcux7Qg.text: The food here is great. It's always fresh and delicious. The atmosphere is great as well. Tables are not easy to get around rush hours.

DvVpNHhPeuILU9bzlBWm_A.text: This place was fantastic. The gyro plate and the steak souvlaki were both amazing. Rice pilaf was tasty, and the french fries were also great.   They're getting pretty busy. We showed up at around 8pm and they were out of Baklava. The owner told me they were going to have to start making twice as much. Awesome.

ZuZDyPvmq8cseTXIVATNgQ.text: You will NOT regret trying this place out !! Got the Gyro Combo! Still brought some left overs back ! The service is GREAT ! Food even better ! Walked into my office and recommended this place to everyone ! Next time I need to try the desserts !

Pz8gOU0GdzunfpBFnfr0IA.text: Let me start by saying, the food is absolutely awesome here!  We have ate here on several occasions and referred many friends.  It's one of those great Mom n' Pop places that is small and quaint.  Tonight we stopped in to eat, place was packed as usual.  We followed right behind another customer coming in to order.   My husband and kids sat down at an available table while I waited my turn to order.  When it was my turn to order, the cashier told me that my family needed to get up from the table.  I could hardly believe what I was hearing.  I asked to verify, "you want my family to get up from the table?" She replied "yes" and said "the people that pay get the table and that my family needed to move."  I couldn't even speak, I was so blown away!  I wasn't even given a chance to order and "pay."  The entire restaurant was witness to this!  How humiliating!  We ended up just walking out.  It is very unfortunate as the food is great, but I will spend my money elsewhere!

jBWdkQaX-B7Ni_7EE-BYTA.text: So.. I haven't tried ALL the greek spots around town, but now that I've found the Great Greek, there's no reason to look further. Their chicken and steak souvlaki is amazing. The seasoning is just right. The grilled shrimp is delicious. The rice pilaf compliments the meats very well. And... Feta Fries?! Come on dude..   The one and only knock I have on this place is... You can't call ahead and dine in. But they still deserve all 5 stars on the food alone. Great people too. So yeah, only greek joint in town that I would suggest!

DO3vV9-nRvP5I3eYRHo5Gw.text: This restaurant reminded me of the cultural of Greece - inexpensive, casual, and  running on its own clock (read as SLOW). The food is delicious and worth the wait, just don't expect to be in and out quickly. The baklava is also delicious and heavy on the walnuts which is always good (and the expensive part of baklava).

ySjNVeovUx3v0pu-SrwHoQ.text: This place is absolutely delicious! I had the hummus and pita bread, which were both perfect. I also had the greek bowl with falafel and it was the best falafel I've had since getting the real deal in Cairo. The bowl was huge, enough for 2 people. I loved the dressing they used, very simple, but great flavor!   The only downside it the lengthy wait to get your food, but for this freshness and quality I will gladly wait! They did bring out the hummus quickly though, so we had something to snack on at least.

9Afu6LhRRMYEtEaJW9zAHQ.text: I HATE HUMMUS, but bought some for my wife... I devoured the hummus here! Had the Gyro and feta fries which came with a salad....I practically licked the plate clean! To top it off,  I finished the meal off with some Baklava....perhaps the best thing I've ever ate! Run to this place, do not walk! It is AMAZING!

82615TSkEtcYDPiaqU-Hrg.text: This place offers some great Greek food! I truly have never been a huge fan of Greek food mainly because finding good Greek food seems to be a constant disappointment.  This place is pretty decent and I actually got to try something I have never tried before, Avgolemono soup which is like a chicken and rice soup but with a hint of lemon. The place is small but not overly decorated in white and blue which is a nice change.  The service could have been a little friendlier but maybe it was on off day. I definitely will return.

MJEvdqIpeBHyFBeWSAkCQg.text: Simply the best Greek restaurant in Las Vegas! I tried pretty much everything from the dips to the baklava (dessert)!  But what keeps bringing me back (aside from the outstanding service, is the gyro and my favorite menu item, the rice bowl . The produce is super fresh ,the dishes are so tasty and they are extremely generous with the portions for the price!!  That makes this place one of my top restaurants in town.  What makes a good dinning experience is also the service .The owner is really  sweet, always smiling, running everywhere to make sure every customer is happy.  Great Greek is the way to go!!! Two thumbs up !!!

4k57ED8a5iVRni4jRgDP9Q.text: Delicious food and excellent service from the young man and woman taking orders and waiting tables. Loved it all.

O9kSjnZey_I1awqu51PgAw.text: My first time here, and I have been to other similar restaurants. This one is by far my favorite, when I'm on this side of town I will be eating here ..

oTceFcZqIUBcJ4zxv_NHGA.text: One of my favorite local, family-run businesses in Henderson. Their Gyro Plate is my absolute favorite! It comes served with your choice of rice pilaf, fries, or Greek salad and then AMAZING tzatziki!! It's  super delicious - I cannot get enough of it. Yia Yia's Pastaccio ("grandma's lasagna") is also another great option. Oh, and don't forget their mouth watering Feta Fries!!!  Whenever I come in the staff is super friendly and personable. Zack is awesome and makes sure you're getting taken care of and that everything is to our satisfaction. The place is always clean and they have a lot of beverage options as well.   I wouldn't get Greek food anywhere else in town, this place is just too amazing!

jOxG4fkpHrLMaIiyWXP3dg.text: Best Greek food in Henderson. Consistently great!! Parking tight but worth all the struggles.

9WgIFiQput0-HaR_VGin-g.text: Fresh, fresh, fresh!  I tried the chicken soup, a side salad, the gyro plate, falafel, and feta fries. I was stunned at how fresh and tasty everything was. Washed it all down with a fountain Coke...what more do you need.  A great meal after a long day driving.  Locals, this is a hidden gem!

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Gyro plate, feta fries, falafel, salad!

9WoktzMydvrWQ9VbqjFp3Q.text: That soup (which is named a word that I can never pronounce) is so good! More lemon would have made it even better. The feta fries that everyone was raving about are very good; the perfect bar food munchie. I was pretty hungry, so I also got a small Greek salad, which wasn't very small! It was very fresh and good. Same with the pita bread. Yum yum yum! Customer service was great, too. I wish they had Jasmine tea or something unique like that, but only unsweetened Fuse.

AA2OvT7WHSSDbmOLcA1UKQ.text: I travel to Henderson often for business, and I have been wanting to try this place for some time. I'm glad I did- WOW! I will be back often!

AQA8AG9DhQAx3vRNkHcGXA.text: The best Greek restaurant in the Henderson/Las Vegas area. The staff are super friendly, the prices are reasonable and the food is absolutely delicious!

SlzFfSJxd-MlyvLJYE_Gvw.text: Absolutely FANTASTIC!!!! The service was a+++!!! The girl at the counter was so nice and so informative. We got the feta app with cucumbers (OUTSTANDING), I got the Greek salad (small) wth gyro meat, my husband got he rice bowl with double chicken and said it was incredible. We happened to be in the Henderson area, and pulled up yelp for a lunch spot, SO GLAD we did! So yummy, super clean, and excellent service. What more could you ask for?!  And we found out they just opened a location right near our house on Blue Diamond!! So naturally we went there the next day, LOL!

EbjgZ45nn53Gb3_ffr75Kw.text: Great food. Will definitely come again and try more of the menu. The spanakopita was tasty. Service was fast and friendly, the place was clean and inviting

JyVRPgrQKcFDO3EVp4BoqA.text: Two words: Falafel Pita. I'm not lying when I say that The Great Greek's Falafel Pita is the best I've had. Bold statement, yes, but I have my reasons. FOOD I made my order into a combo and chose a side of fries over the salad (not this time, lettuce). The combo also comes with a drink which I wasn't aware of, because I'm accustomed to dining at Greek and Mediterranean restaurants that normally charge extra for beverages. +Falafel Pita: Hummus, shredded lettuce, diced onions and tomatoes, and ground falafels all wrapped in a soft, warm pita and topped with a pepper. To say that it was "good" would be an understatement, so just look at this photo instead: (yelp.com/user_local_phot...). One of the main reasons why I like Great Greek's Falafel Pita is that It's easy to eat. Unlike the ones from other Greek and Mediterranean restaurants I've eaten at, Great Greek breaks down the falafels, thus making it easier to consume. I couldn't help but think, "Duh, why didn't anyone think of this sooner?!" while I was eating my pita. It just makes sense! Breaking down the falafels saves me time from having to unwrap my pita and eat my falafels with a knife and fork. +French Fries: Originally, I wanted to order a side of Feta Fries, but taking into consideration that this was my first time dining at this establishment, I stuck with my combo's fries. Deep fried, golden brown, and crunchy, the fries are delicious as they are. I can only imagine how wonderful they would taste like with crumbled feta cheese on top. SERVICE Restaurants where the employees greet you with a smile are a plus in my book. When I first walked in, I was welcomed by the kind lady working at the counter. The food here is quickly made and served right to your table within 10 minutes, so you won't have to wait too long to eat. OVERALL Their Falafel Pita combo has won me over, and now I *have* to try everything on their menu, as well as their baklava that's displayed right there on the counter, ready to be consumed.

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Falafel Pita and Fries.

6akYU11gPpsi97pnbLo7vQ.text: I've never had a bad meal here. I just tried their rice bowl which was kind of like a Cafe Rio style salad but totally Greek. I took that bad boy home and drizzled some Sriracha sauce and it was heaven.   All their food tastes so fresh and very flavorful. Some people don't do Greek food right, but these guys are great, they run a solid restaurant.  Five solid stars.

photos.caption: Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Rice salad with Falafel, was dang good.

dic8fuB1qiTBdFJBYdjqVg.text: By far, my favorite place to each in Henderson.  Their food is extremely fresh.

Xs7vjgSG5chW1SpcPSmbsQ.text: All I can say is there is not one dish you will not regret ordering.  Been coming here since the first week they opened a little over a year ago. (Can you tell by all the Yelp photos I eat here alot?? )    Ambiance/Service -Casual, family friendly, modern decor, bright & clean, indoor & outdoor patio seating, place order at counter. If I could I would  give the staff of Great Greek more than  5 stars for service. From the first time I stepped foot when they opened,they have always been welcoming, warm and friendly.  They greet their regular customers by first name when they walk in and leave. Really impressive.  Food: Yia Yia's Pasticcio a Greek style lasgna that's topped with Greek Bechamel is a very popular dish to order here so if you want a slice of savory goodness I'd get here early for lunch.  If you make your meal a combo, get the Feta Fries!!!! Crisped golden fries topped with Feta cheese that's melted slighty. A different and delicious twist to eating french fries for sure!    Everytime  I order a Gyro and take a pic and post it, my friends are jealous cause here I am sitting having this huge Gyro that's filled with tender slices of beef(they also have choice of lamb and chicken)  feta cheese topped with a genourous amount of  their Tzaziki sauce that's made from scratch. Real light refreshing taste. Their Tzaziki sauce is gold!!   Ohhh the Grilled Garlic Shrimp is another plate that stands out. Shrimp is plump, jumbo size, it's an insanely garlickly & buttery masterpiece.  The Chef behind all these delicious dishes worked for notable chefs on the Strip. So you are in for a real treat when you dine here!   I must not forget dessert!! The most important meal  I never ever miss ;)  You cant beat Yia Yia's Rice pudding to top of your meal!!  Im not a big puddin fan but after Chef came over with a sample of rice pudding for me to try, I can say I am fan of rice pudding!! At least  the way Alice makes it here. What sets it apart is  it's creamy but has an amazingly light texture, with hint of cinammon.   Enough said. Don't pass up this comforting dessert.  The proof is in the puddin'!   Great food, great people, Great Greek lives up to it's moniker.

Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Garlic shrimp skewers
Photo of The Great Greek - Henderson, NV, United States. Garlic Shrimp and Avgolemono soup

H_FvsWI8P9iaEvvYJ6xF_w.text: We had a great experience! The place was packed and smelled amazing as soon as we walked in. Mom ordered the Gyro plate and I ordered the chicken souvlaki. The fries with feta are a trip to heaven, the meat is well seasoned and cooked to perfection. The  Gyro and Tzaziki are our top favorites and no matter what, do not leave without having Baklava. Superb!  I hope they keep cooking like this, the problem in Henderson is that restaurants change their quality of food and service, let's hope you stay on top for many years!

rSqUV0DqHQkwdGwXe0Xvng.text: This is my favorite Greek restaurant in town! When I go out I usually talk people into trying this place because I know they'll love it! The employees are all friendly and fast and the restaurant is very clean. I definitely recommend ordering their gyros and feta fries!

pgqhQN1rGnyUdYIHK0EBkQ.text: The best Greek food in town!  We always get the gyros with  feta fries and a spanikopita...so yummy!  We will have to try some of their other items that look delicious.   Super friendly staff and it's always so clean.

rToCM1kBp8Kodan0UBWocw.text: I've had the gyro salad and regular gyro - both were hits each time I got them! And I love love love love love their baklava! GET THE BAKLAVA! IT'S SO SWEET AND FLAKY AND AMAZING! I seriously take so many people there just for dessert!

2tuYlgJZgZm8jhFZxHhJ6Q.text: I'm in Henderson on business and am so glad I found this place. I've eaten here once for dinner and twice for lunch. They have some vegetarian options that are actually delicious and satisfying. I especially liked the Greek Salad Wrap and the falafel rice bowl. And besides the delicious food, the staff is very friendly.

9IsYhJJ5TJzTY1stzreqQg.text: Absolutely phenomenal food. Great family owned atmosphere. Food is on par. Prices are reasonable for the quality of the food. Portions are a good size. And by all means upgrade your fries to the feta fries. They are amazing

UkStVdueQ_Cn3Opm5whgew.text: I live many miles away, but I returned today for the third time. Simply delicious. Friendly service. Generous portions. Surprisingly pleasant patio seating, too, given that the restaurant is in a strip mall. Go there. You will love it.

riockVqDcYfXwY9drmf4sQ.text: Absolutely  delicious. Not phenomenal atmosphere - after all, it's in a strip mall. But very friendly and helpful service, and the food was great. The  great Greek Rice Bowl with gyro meat was delicious and more than enough. My wife tried the gyro - maybe not the best ever, but good. The feta fries are killer, matched only by our dessert choice, the kourabiedes  cookies.  Well worth a stop.

abNOjXMyg84OHLXvacG-FA.text: This place is the best greek food I have found in vegas. Hands down worth the drive off the strip.

z0Q7TYpt3A3ZIFs3YVjJ4Q.text: I think my rating would be closer to 3.5, but I rounded up instead of down because I really enjoyed the food.  It is a small family-owned restaurant in a strip mall, close to Sunset Station.  This place is really close to my apartment, and since it was highly rated on Yelp, my boyfriend and I chose to go here to satisfy a craving for gyros.  We called our order in to go ahead of time, and the lady said it would be ready in 15 minutes.  When we got to the restaurant, we waited in line for a bit, and got to the counter -- only for them to tell us they didn't have our order in the system and didn't remember taking it.  This interaction threw me off a little bit, because the lady who took our order on the phone only 30 minutes before was the one telling us that we must have dialed the wrong number.  She had us show the call history on my boyfriend's phone to make sure we called the right number.  What other number is there to call???  She did apologize though (after trying to verify that we, indeed, talked to her and not another employee), and gave us a free piece of baklava.  That was nice.  It was too sweet for my boyfriend, so I ate pretty much all of it (yum).  As for the food, it was extremely tasty and fresh.  My boyfriend had the lamb gyro with feta fries.  He thought the gyro was great; the fries would have been better if the feta cheese could have melted into the fries instead of sitting on top of it.  My order was the gyro plate with rice pilaf, which was excellent.  The rice was seasoned great and the gyro was delicious.  It was actually a lot more than I could eat and ended up being two meals for me, which is pretty good for a $10 plate.  It also came with salad, which is another meal in itself.  The phone situation was pretty offputting, but the food is good enough and this place is close enough that we'll probably make this our go-to locale for Greek food.  Perhaps we will just order in person instead.

Zu27dKLsEtIhwrPpPYOZLw.text: We went back to this place before we left for home because it was just so good. This time the meat was moist and perfect, the rice waa still perfect, the service remained excellent, the baklava is something I am still dreaming about. We also tried the 4 dip appetizer which was delicious and came with the wonderful, soft pita bread and the greek cookies which were flakey and amazing. We will definitely come back the next time we are in town.

xcgSfnZMMx3jXgl6-ukMwg.text: I came here with my friends who lived in Vegas.  They suggested Greek and this was the place to GO!!!.  They are busy but you dont have to wait super long to get your food.  We ordered the traditional gyro and it was THE BOMB.  The sauces they use are super tasteful and they are super HOT (hot service).  The hummus and pita are on point, fresh, warm, and fulfilling on a cold night.  Overall, If I were in Vegas again or ever lived in Vegas, this would be my regular Friday night spot.

i30XN_bh3oKGcNkTruM9-Q.text: The Great Greek is hands down the best Greek food in Henderson/Vegas.  The girls at the counter are always great and funny.  The food has inspired a new love in me for Greek Food. Their food is always made with love and particularly their Gyros are always on point.  Go there now!

aEEb4rfw57MAck8A2zA2iA.text: This is my Favorite place to eat! I've been coming here for the last year and it has been amazing every time. The salad, kabob and even the soup Amazing! If you are in the area it's a must. I've been to a few other Greek restaurants but this is the best. Oh and when you stop in please do not forget to order feta fries, life changing deliciousness !!
